exceptions.tactic: destruct a1 as [a1a a1b], a2 as [a2a a2b].
exceptions.exn: The reference a1 was not found in the current environment.

original: apply Build_ResidualSeparationAlgebra. - intros a1 a2. destruct a1 as [a1a a1b], a2 as [a2a a2b]. intros [H1 H2] [H3 H4]. split. + apply prod_incr; auto. + apply prod_incr; auto. - intros n. destruct (incr_exists n) as [m [Hres Hincr]]. exists (n, m). split; [assumption | apply prod_incr; assumption].
